From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Quickstrike:








Quickstrike, loosing his grip on the physical world, head spinning felt 
warmth at his side and and smelt smoke near-by. He could also hear snapping, 
something that sounded like fire. Something inside his head screamed: fire!

He forced himself to jerk his head out of the drifting, in order to save his 
life. He knew it was near-by. He shifted his body to the side and 
transformed to his robot mode.  He could see embers at the hole where he 
entered the dead tree. He crashed his good leg against the inside of the 
tree and broke through. He hit it a few more times. He slipped out of the 
new hole, watching where he put him busted leg. There was a fire!

"Slag!" he cried out. In the distance, he was Jackel and Pheniox escaping 
the firey scene. He was mad. Why couldn't they leave him alone?

He stood up and limped on one leg, away from the flames. He fell twice, 
landing hard on his leg. He cursed each time, mad that he had these wounds 
to handicap him.

He transformed back to his beast mode and skittered fast away from the 
flames.
